key_risks: Regulatory and antitrust scrutiny from the U.S. Department of Justice

Litigation risks, including False Claims Act cases and class-action lawsuits
Criticism over healthcare cost and affordability practices
controversies: Antitrust investigation into pharmacy benefit management and acquisition strategies
Cyberattack on Change Healthcare compromising 100 million patient records
Class-action lawsuits over data privacy and AI-driven claim denials
Settlement of $69 million for underperforming 401(k) funds
social_issues: Criticism over rising healthcare costs and opaque pricing practices
Backlash over data privacy breaches affecting millions of patients
governance_issues: Regulatory scrutiny over Medicare Advantage risk adjustment practices
Fiduciary risks highlighted by the 401(k) settlement
Ethical concerns over AI-driven claim denials
